creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
TOMCAT_HOME defaults to /jakarta-tomcat/bin instead
of /jakarta-tomcat

This causes the startup look for the webserver.jar in
/jakarta-tomcat/bin/lib instead of /jakarta-tomcat/lib

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
tomcat.bat sets TOMCAT_HOME=. if no value exists in the environment.  This will 
most likely be tomcat/bin.  As work around, set TOMCAT_HOME before running 
tomcat.bat or use startup.bat.  Startup.bat is a little smarter about guessing 
a value for TOMCAT_HOME.  

This won't be changed for tomcat 3.2.2 becuase there are good work arounds and 
it runs the potential of breaking existing scripts.
